eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.weapons

Class CustomWeaponLance

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.weapons.CustomWeaponLance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomItem, CustomWeapon

    public class CustomWeaponLance
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomWeapon
    A collection of methods for using the lance weapon.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static SkillParticle particle
      A particle, used to indicate the hit area of the lance.

      static void spin(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Creates an 8 block wide particle circle around the player and damages + throws back every entity inside of it.

      Creates a 3 block long particle line in front of the player and damages every entity near it.

    • Method Detail

      • use

        public void use(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent event)
        Cancels the event of a lance interaction. Starts a spin attack around the player, if they are sneaking. Otherwhise attacks a line in front of the player, if it was a right click.
        Specified by:
        use in interface CustomItem
        Parameters:
        event - The interaction event.
        See Also:
        spin(Player), thrust(Player)

      • getCustomItemMaterials

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        The list of materials.

      • getCustomWeaponLores

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCustomWeaponLores(boolean hasSkillSlot)
        Gets the lores to show on an instance of the custom weapon.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        The list of lores.

      • thrust

        public static void thrust(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Creates a 3 block long particle line in front of the player and damages every entity near it. Makes the lance loose 2 durability.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who performs the attack.
        See Also:
        Cooldown.playerWeaponSkillUse(Player, String), SkillUtils.callPlayerFixedDamageEvent(Player, Entity, double), ParticleSpawner.spawnParticleLine(Location, Location, SkillParticle, int, double), DurabilityCalculator.damageItem(Player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack, int, boolean)

      • spin

        public static void spin(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Creates an 8 block wide particle circle around the player and damages + throws back every entity inside of it. Makes the lance loose 4 durability.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who performs the attack.
        See Also:
        Cooldown.playerWeaponSkillUse(Player, String), SkillUtils.callPlayerFixedDamageEvent(Player, Entity, double), SkillUtils.throwBackEntity(Entity, Location, double), SkillUtils.rotateEntity(Entity), ParticleSpawner.spawnParticleCircle(Location, SkillParticle, double, int), DurabilityCalculator.damageItem(Player, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack, int, boolean)
